Deepdark Strike.name: Deepdark Strike
Deepdark Strike.fullText:
Underchasm Darkwatcher Attack 11Deepdark Strike

Your weapon is wreathed in an impenetrable blackness, which darkens your enemy’s eyes when you strike.

Encounter        Arcane, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 71.
Deepdark Strike.flavor: Your weapon is wreathed in an impenetrable blackness, which darkens your enemy’s eyes when you strike.
Deepdark Strike.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Deepdark Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Umber Hulk.name: Form of the Umber Hulk
Form of the Umber Hulk.fullText:
Underchasm Darkwatcher Attack 20Form of the Umber Hulk

Your eyes take on an insectlike appearance, you sprout antennae from atop your head, and a pair of sharp mandibles grows out from your mouth. At the moment you choose, you can gaze upon your enemies and sow confusion in their ranks.

Daily        Polymorph, Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the guardian form of the umber hulk. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Fortitude defense. In addition, you also gain tremorsense 5 and a burrow speed of 2.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Umber Hulk Attack power while you are in this form.


Form of the Umber Hulk Attack

Encounter      Polymorph, Primal
Standard Action      Close blast 3

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Constitution or Charisma vs. Will

Hit: Target slides 1 square and is dazed (save ends).

Miss: Target slides 1 square.

Requirement: The power Form of the Umber Hulk must be active in order to use this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 71.
Form of the Umber Hulk.flavor: Your eyes take on an insectlike appearance, you sprout antennae from atop your head, and a pair of sharp mandibles grows out from your mouth. At the moment you choose, you can gaze upon your enemies and sow confusion in their ranks.

Cursefire Light.name: Cursefire Light
Cursefire Light.fullText:
Underchasm Darkwatcher Utility 12Cursefire Light

Your body is ablaze in an eerie green flame that feeds off your curses, bolstering you.

Daily        Arcane, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy cursed by you hits you with an attack, you can choose to gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 71.
Cursefire Light.flavor: Your body is ablaze in an eerie green flame that feeds off your curses, bolstering you.
Cursefire Light.range:
Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy cursed by you hits you with an attack, you can choose to gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw.
Cursefire Light.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy cursed by you hits you with an attack, you can choose to gain 5 temporary hit points or make a saving throw.
